definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
to moisten/to grease/to apply (cream, ointment)/to dip a brush in ink

sentences.english: When removing mascara, brush from inner side of the eyelashes to the outer side.
sentences.chinese: 卸除睫毛膏要從根部向梢部擦拭。

sentences.english: Do you have a good thickening mascara?
sentences.chinese: 你們有賣濃稠式睫毛膏嗎？

sentences.english: Most likely you look great with some bronzer and a couple strokes of mascara.
sentences.chinese: 打上黃色眼影，塗上睫毛膏，你很可能看起來很漂亮。

sentences.english: This Rimmel Maxxxx Effect mascara is fantastic.
sentences.chinese: 這個睫毛膏真是太棒了。

sentences.english: Do a second coat with the same mascara and let set for a minute.
sentences.chinese: 用同一只睫毛膏刷第二次，然後停一會，等它凝固。

sentences.english: I recommend this mini-brush mascara to you.
sentences.chinese: 我向您推薦這種迷你刷頭的睫毛膏。

sentences.english: Please place the switch OFF and screw the brush into mascara bottle after each use.
sentences.chinese: 請在每次使用後發生的開關關閉和螺桿到睫毛膏瓶刷。

sentences.english: She stared at him, her mascara smeared, tears upon her cheeks.
sentences.chinese: 她凝望着他，睫毛膏模糊在眼角，臉頰上有淚。

sentences.english: My eyes were puffy from crying and mascara had run down my cheeks.
sentences.chinese: 我的眼睛因爲哭過有些浮腫，睫毛膏流到了臉頰上。
嘿，上校，你的睫毛膏流掉了。

sentences.english: Where do I put my mascara?
I didn't wear mascara in Just Go WithIt.
sentences.chinese: 在隨波逐流裏面，我沒塗睫毛膏。

sentences.english: We also have mascara designed to lengthen the eyelashes.
sentences.chinese: 我們也有一些助長睫毛的睫毛膏。

sentences.english: Not to mention putting on lipstick, mascara or trying light a cigarette.
sentences.chinese: 更不用提把上口紅，睫毛膏或試圖點燃的香菸。

sentences.english: Top tips include never applying mascara to your lower lash line.
sentences.chinese: 最重要的建議是決不能用睫毛膏塗你的下眼線。

sentences.english: Very often we don't even think that our fave mascara has a very limited lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 你會想到我們最愛的睫毛膏也有使用期限嗎？
